EmailTemplate.name: Further to my voicemail (1560447679.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Further to my voicemail (1560447679.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Tracy,
I hope you've been doing well.
​Further to my voicemail I left you a few moments ago: Have you had an opportunity to discuss G&T helping your organization lower costs on supplies and make ordering simpler, with your Executive Director?
Perhaps the timing is not good for you and your organization? If that is the case, no worries at all, however, we also understand that everyone is very busy these days.
Please let us know how we can serve and support you and I look forward to hearing from you when it is convenient for you.
Take care
Kind regards, Tomas Hansen Business Development Manager, Corporate Sales | Lower Mainland, BC 4560 Tillicum St. | Burnaby BC Canada | V5J 5L4 E-mail: tomashansen@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:tomashansen@grandandtoy.com]]> | Mobile: 604-649-2145 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]> TECHNOLOGY AND NETWORKING SOLUTIONS | COFFEE AND BREAKROOM SUPPLIES | OFFICE SUPPLIES | INTERIORS AND FURNITURE | FACILITY CLEANING SUPPLIES | PROCUREMENT STREAMLINING SOLUTIONS CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
